title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Rural Financial Services Programme

description.narrative: The programme is aimed at creating a healthy and extensive rural finance system that would, consequently, offer rural population and households the opportunity for higher and more stable income, thus alleviating poverty. More specifically, the programme would: (a) fill existing gaps in the support currently available to the microfinance subsector in order to enhance the quality of rural financial services and render them viable, with high quality of portfolio; (b) facilitate the expansion of sustainable financial services to substantially reach more of the country''s rural population than hitherto; (c) extend financial services to areas that have heretofore been poorly served; and (d) help potential clientele of rural MFIs to become more and increasingly business-oriented.

name.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Rural Financial Services Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
